amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to restrict base commanders' ability to fly unauthorized flags at their discretion.
amendment.purpose: Amendment restricts base commanders' ability to fly unauthorized flags at their discretion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mills amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 210 (Roll no. 253).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mills amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 210 (Roll no. 253).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
